pddl:
(:event ANTIGRAVITY_OBJECTS
    :parameters (?e - entity ?h - receptacle ?c - ceiling ?r - room ?p - player)
    :precondition (and
        (room ?r workshop)
        (at ?e ?r)
        (at ?p ?r)
        (not (type ?h ceiling))
        (or
            (on ?e ?h)
            (and
                (in ?e ?h)
                (open ?h)
                )
            )
        (type ?c ceiling)
        )
    :effect (and
        (when
            (and
                (in ?e ?h)
                (open ?h)
                )
            (and
                (not (in ?e ?h))
                (on ?e ?c)
                )
            )
        (when
            (on ?e ?h)
            (and
                (not (on ?e ?h))
                (on ?e ?c)
                )
            )
        )
    )
event_feedback: The {{ e }} floats up to the ceiling.
Magical experiments have reversed and dampened gravity in this room. You begin to float in the air.
Gravity behaves normally in this room. You stop floating in the air.
The world twists around you, and you suddenly find yourself elsewhere. {{ room_desc }}
